title: Move %localappdata%\lxss to %appdata%\lxss so the environment follows a student around a computer lab.
body: I run student computer labs and I'd like to be able to redirect the lxss folder to a server location so students don't have to always find the same computer or reload the whole environment. Ideally there would be a GPO that allowed redirection of only the lxss folder to a server location, in the same way My Documents can be redirected now.

comments.body: I can see this being done for the user profile. Making the entire WSL user space portable seems problematic, but I couldn't say what should or shouldn't be migrating, especially if you've APT installed something on one system and maybe added it to your .bashrc. I'm not sure that this could be solved easily.
